meanings.definition: In or to every place; everywhere.
meanings.sent1: She searched everyplace for her lost keys.
meanings.sent2: The children ran everyplace in the park.
meanings.sent3: He looked everyplace for his missing sock, even in the cookie jar!
meanings.sent4: The music echoed everyplace, filling the room with its melody.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone brightly, lighting up everyplace in the night sky.
